import logo from "../logo/logo.png" import iphone from "../image/iphone.png" import { BiLockAlt,BiDollar } from "react-icons/bi"; import { BsFillPeopleFill,BsInfoSquare,BsSun} from "react-icons/bs"; import Feature from "./feature" import React,{Component} from "react" import About from "./about" import video1 from "../image/video1.mp4" import Fouter from "./fouter" import Slide from "./silde" import Nav from "../component/nav" import Team from "./team" import { AiFillHome } from "react-icons/ai"; import { VscChromeClose } from "react-icons/vsc"; import Info from "./info" import { GiHamburgerMenu } from "react-icons/gi"; import Subscribe from "./subscibebox" import EmailBox from "../component/emailbox" import { FaRegMoon ,FaMoon} from "react-icons/fa"; import { RiTodoLine ,RiTeamLine} from "react-icons/ri"; import { FiInstagram,FiTwitter,FiFacebook } from "react-icons/fi"; import { IoIosNotifications } from "react-icons/io"; class Home extends Component { state={ nav:false, mode:false, } switchToggle=()=>{ this.setState({ mode:!this.state.mode }) localStorage.setItem('mode', !this.state.mode); } openNav=(data)=>{ this.setState({ nav:data }) } componentDidMount=()=>{ const mode = localStorage.getItem('mode') === 'true'; this.setState({mode:mode}); } render(){ return (
{this.openNav(false)}} className="modierrr">

A mobile app and web applications that assist you with your fitness related activities and help you earn money from the comfort of your own home.
); } } export default Home;
